unnormalised: For example, if you're enrolled in a specific government health insurance scheme, like the Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY), you'll get a unique beneficiary ID. You might see it referred to as an ABHA ID or simply your PMJAY ID: something like AB-PMJAY-2023-1234567890. Keep this number handy when you go to empaneled hospitals.
